featureSchema.name: Multi-User Support
featureSchema.description: Supports concurrent access by multiple users, offering team collaboration capabilities with role-based access control.
featureSchema.userStory: As a team member, I want to collaborate on the mock server configuration with role-based permissions so that different team members can manage specific parts of the system.
featureSchema.acceptanceCriteria: The system must allow multiple users to access and modify configurations concurrently, with role-based restrictions controlling access to sensitive settings.
featureSchema.diagram: Diagram illustrating multi-user access with various roles and permissions interacting with the mock server.
featureSchema.additional: Include mechanisms for logging user actions and auditing changes made by different users.
featureSchema.prompt: Implement multi-user support in the mock server configuration, ensuring that multiple team members can collaborate with role-based access control and auditing capabilities.
featureSchema.code:
// Pseudo-code for role checking:
// if(user.role !== 'admin') { restrictAccess(); }
featureSchema.notes: Monitor for conflicts when multiple users are editing configurations simultaneously.
